thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Pioneer Natural Resources Increases Dividend On Common Shares And Announces Common Share Repurchase Program

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pioneer Natural Resources Increases Dividend On Common Shares And Announces Common Share Repurchase Program
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Pioneer Natural Resources Co:
* PIONEER NATURAL RESOURCES COMPANY INCREASES DIVIDEND ON COMMON SHARES AND ANNOUNCES COMMON SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM
* PIONEER NATURAL RESOURCES - ‍BOARD APPROVED COMMON STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM TO OFFSET IMPACT OF DILUTION ASSOCIATED WITH ANNUAL EMPLOYEE STOCK AWARDS​
* PIONEER NATURAL RESOURCES CO - ‍STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM ALLOWS FOR UP TO $100 MILLION OF COMMON STOCK TO BE REPURCHASED DURING 2018​
* PIONEER NATURAL RESOURCES - BOARD APPROVED STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM FOR UP TO $100 MILLION OF COMMON STOCK TO BE REPURCHASED DURING 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
